name: Malaysian Student Association
description:
1. To gather Malaysian students who are enrolled in the Texas A&M University.
2. To act as a platform for Malaysian Aggies on campus to promote integration and understanding among Malaysians and non-Malaysians at Texas A&M.
3. Aims to promote Malaysian life and culture to the already varied TAMU community.
4. To cultivate mutual understanding and forge a closer relationship among Malaysia students and international students.
5. To organize gatherings activities, outings and cultural activities to introduces Malaysian culture to people throughout TAMU.
6. To encourage networking among Malaysian students and non-Malaysian students for a better learning environment in academic life.
6. To help out new Malaysian students at the Texas A&M University.
